name: Alfredo's Sneaky Meal
description:
In a building full of zombies and bats (and even falling watermelons!), Alfredo, armed only with a frying pan and the option to turn the lights on and off, must fight and sneak through his enemies in order to get his dreamed meal. Alfredo's Sneaky Meal is a stealth platform arcade game where you will put both your memory and your skills to the test in order to to help Alfredo achieve his goal - and in order to score big!


> Main features and gameplay:
- Stealth combat;
- Possibility to turn lights on and off;
- Lights On:
i) can see enemies' bodies, furniture, meal and watermelons;
ii) loses more score points per second;
iii) gets less points if you kill an enemy from behind or get the meal;
iv) enemy turns quickly if you approach from behind.
- Lights Off:
i) can't see enemies' bodies, furniture and meal;
ii) can only see enemies' eyes and watermelons;
iii) loses less points per second;
iv) gets more points if you kill an enemy from behind (sneaky kill) or get the meal (sneaky meal);
v) enemies do not turn if you approach from behind.
- Three lives per run;
- Score attack;
- Progressively increasing enemies and enemies' speed;
- Retro-style graphics;
- Hi-Score autosaving.
